TopicTitle: Up-Goer Five Sky-House-UPDATED WITH BETTER COLOR!

Articles.Content:
http://i.imgur.com/RQgcQEf.jpg I can't post the image with a [img/] thing because it's REALLY big.

Based on XKCD's Upgoer Five. http://xkcd.com/1133/

Update! made it look more like a blueprint.

Edited September 13, 2013 by GregroxMun

Here's a description of KSP for ya!

Us space team's space game is a many-type game where the people make their own space job.

In Us space team's space game, you must build a space-good thing, that can fly its people out into space, without killing them. For you to use is a lot of parts, which must be put-together to make a good space-thing. Each part has its own job and will change the way a space-thing flies (or doesn't). So make yourself go in, and get ready to try some Up-Goer Learning! By the way, you are not a human in this game. You are a little green man.
